about_the_game:
Welcome to the Isle of Stars, a tranquil paradise where cats roam freely and island life feels untouched by time. In "Cat and Isle of Stars," you’ll manage a unique cat café, build bonds with local residents, and discover the joy of daily life, from farming and fishing to crafting cozy spaces for your cats.

As you settle into this charming world, you may sense the presence of something more—a legend that whispers through the island. By night, the cats may lead you into parts of the island’s history long forgotten, and cryptic hints from residents suggest the island hides a greater purpose. Is your arrival a twist of fate, or does this land hold something special for you?

Game Features:

  • Cat Café Haven: Decorate and nurture your café to create a warm haven for island cats and visitors alike.

  • Island Legends: Follow the cats’ quiet guidance as you explore the island’s hidden lore under moonlit skies.

  • Resident Connections: Each resident has a unique story tied to the island’s past; helping them reveals more about the world and its secrets.

  • Serene Island Life: Tend crops, craft, and fish along the shores to build your own vibrant corner on the island.

  • Protect the Isle: As whispers of outsiders’ plans circulate, the cats’ behaviors grow strange, hinting that they may be leading you to an ancient strength, perhaps the island’s last hope for peace.

short_description: "Cat and Isle of Stars" is a cozy sim adventure on a mysterious cat-inhabited island. Run a cat café, enjoy island life, and bond with locals, as whispers of an ancient mystery and an outsider threat reveal secrets from the island’s past.
